item.title: Getting Started with MERN Stack Part 1
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: Hello! Let’s have the introductions now …. What is NodeJS? Hello! Web development has evolved a lot with recent updates to ECMA script specifications. For those who have heard the term MEAN Stack and are confused as to what does MERN mean. It is just React – R for the Angular – A in the stack, the rest being MongoDB , ExpressJS , NodeJS .

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
